abstracts.cdata!:
The Fertilizer Imports Project aims to
            finance the import of fertilizer for FY80, to improve
            fertilizer distribution and marketing, and to establish a
            more effective pricing system for fertilizer. The credit
            would be administered by the Bangladesh Agricultural
            Development Corporation. A ministerial level fertilizer
            coordinating committee has been established to improve the
            planning for fertilizer procurement and distribution. Should
            fertilizer consumption be reduced below expected levels
            import arrivals would be rephased to assist in meeting FY81
            requirements. The total amount would be utilized for
            imported fertilizer (in bag or bulk), mostly for area and
            TSP, but some DAP and MP may also be financed.
